sentences.en: According to law, public security organs have the authority to detain.
sentences.cn: 公安机关依法具有拘留权.

sentences.en: Allow me to detain you for a moment.
But lock up their brother ( not be to detain ).
sentences.cn: 但是却要将他们兄弟关押 ( 不是拘留 ).

sentences.en: He caught her arm in a subconscious attempt to detain her.
sentences.cn: 他下意识地抓住她的胳膊想挽留她。

sentences.en: He was detained in Washington on urgent business.
sentences.cn: 他因紧急事务耽搁在了华盛顿。

sentences.en: He was instructed to inspect the cargo on the ship and detain such cargo if necessary.
sentences.cn: 他奉命去检查船上所载货物并于必要时扣留该项货物.

sentences.en: I'll not detain you an instant longer, on any account , Kit.
sentences.cn: 无论怎样我不会耽搁你多久的, 吉特.

sentences.en: Lunar hire 3600 yuan, contain property cost , cost , detain 3 Fu Yi.
sentences.cn: 每月租用金额金3600元, 含物管费 、 卫生费, 押三付一.

sentences.en: No entity or individual shall confiscate or detain any motor vehicle plate.
sentences.cn: 任何单位和个人不得收缴、扣留机动车号牌.

sentences.en: Pierce notifies his agents that they are to detain Jack.
sentences.cn: 皮尔斯向他手下的特工通报,他们需要扣留杰克.

sentences.en: She was detained in hospital with a suspected broken leg.
sentences.cn: 她因腿部疑似骨折而被留医。

sentences.en: Stop and detain any suspect that fits the description for investigation.
sentences.cn: 发现可疑人物应做相应的调查.

sentences.en: The act allows police to detain a suspect for up to 48 hours.
sentences.cn: 该法令允许警方将嫌疑犯扣押最多48小时。

sentences.en: This matter isn't very important, and shouldn't detain us very long.
sentences.cn: 这事不很重要, 不该耽搁我们很久.

sentences.en: Two suspects have been detained by the police for questioning .
sentences.cn: 两名嫌疑人被警方拘留审问。

sentences.en: We shall have to detain him and question him.
sentences.cn: 我们只好把他扣起来,讯问他一下.

sentences.en: Well, mother, I won't detain you any longer.
sentences.cn: 好啦, 妈, 我不再留你了.

sentences.en: When Chao Hsin - mei saw Miss Su detain Fang Hung - chien , he left in a huff.
sentences.cn: 赵辛楣 看苏小姐留住方鸿 渐, 奋然而出.

trans.tran_en: to officially prevent someone from leaving a place

trans.tran_cn: 拘留， 扣留； 留住， 耽搁
